roles.note: arg3-instrument occurs with the verb, but not expected here.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, decide-v.01.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Whereas previously I was undecided over the outcome of a fight with Mayweather on last nights showing , and as long as Mayweather was on his absolute A game , I would say my money would be on Mayweather .
example.arg: over the outcome of a fight with Mayweather on last night's showing
